item.title: Master Pilgrim (Level 7)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 11)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Cathedral Worker (Level 5)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 12)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Carpenter (Level 4)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 6)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Cathedral Worker (Level 4)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 3)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Cleaning lady (Level 7)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Collector (Level 11)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 11)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 2)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.
